entities.name: centaur
entities.description: A mythical creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse. It is mentioned in the context of a story or legend.

entities.name: sneak
entities.description: Not specified in the text, but likely refers to a person who sneaks around or does something secretly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as attending a meeting at the Hog's Head.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: A person who looks shocked or surprised by something.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A person who remains motionless and has his mouth hanging open.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The headmistress of Hogwarts, mentioned as speaking to Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as responding to Umbridge's statement.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic, mentioned as the institution where Dumbledore and Umbridge work.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village or town near Hogwarts, mentioned as the location of a meeting attended by Harry.

relationships.description: Umbridge and Dumbledore are arguing about whether Harry's meetings are illegal or not. Umbridge says they are, while Dumbledore asks for evidence that the meetings continued after the decree came into effect.
Umbridge accuses Harry of breaking rules by attending meetings at the Hog's Head.
